original_text: The lofty looks of man shall be humbled, and the haughtiness of men shall be bowed down, and the Lord alone shall be exalted in that day.
korean_text: 그 날에 눈이 높은 자가 낮아지며 교만한 자가 굴복되고 여호와께서 홀로 높임을 받으시리라

sentences.original_text: The lofty looks of man shall be humbled
and haughtiness of men shall be bowed down
and Lord alone shall be exalted in that day
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 주님만이 그 날에 높아지실 것이다
